name: Lights Out (itch) (f00d4tehg0dz)
description:
*Update*

No More Black Screen! If for any reason you do.  press ~ type,  open MainMenuMap

Prototype

Navigate through the library's maze with just a flashlight.  Enemies will freeze in place when you shine the light on them. Can you piece together a key and escape in time?

Make this into a full game?

Would you all be interested in this becoming a full fledged game. Let me know in the comments! I have plans for other mazes
